title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 230.5 - Gasoline dispensing sites - test company certification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 230.5 - Gasoline dispensing sites - test company certification

State Regulations

Test companies shall certify that Stage I vapor recovery
system compliance tests are performed in accordance with the procedures and
protocols contained in the CARB test procedures referenced in section
230.3
(c)(6)(iii)
('a') and ('b) of this Part (see Table 1, Section
200.9
of this Title) and that
testing staff have been trained accordingly to perform these tests. Written
certification must be submitted to the department 30 days prior to performing
the tests or within 30 days after the effective date of this regulation, whichever is later. Notification to the department shall be sent to the

Division of Air Resources, New York State Department of Environmental

Conservation at dar.web@dec.ny.gov. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
230.5

Adopted

New

York State Register January 27, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 04, eff. 2/11/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
